name: Super FrankShot
description:
6 months after the incredible events of Franklin 3, Franklin the Sheep is enjoying his position within Franklin Defense Inc, protecting the innocent from the not innocent. However, one day, he gets sucked into a portal, which transports him into an odd pocket dimension. It appears he is not the only extremely powerful protagonist from a buggy game to be sucked by a portal, as Shotter from OneShot has also been transported to the pocket dimension! It quickly becomes apparent that 3PICAGON, a merging of 2 of the greatest villains from the respective Franklin and OneShot universes, utilized a device to begin merging the two universes. Franklin and Shotter must team up to stop 3PICAGON before its too late...

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Dash (Franklin): LEFT SHIFT

Switch Characters: SPACE

Shoot (Shotter): CLICK LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

Swing (Franklin): HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON AND MOVE MOUSE

You need to eliminate all the enemies to get past each level. Run through the invisible barrier once you killed all the enemies.

Credits:

Development done by Black Frog Studios and Ibrahim Hisham of Minidevs

3rd Party Assets:

Tilesets by Kenney.nl

Ouse- "Realistic" (we got hijacked by some weird stan)
